title: We are paying for sins committed by others
body_lines: Tourism Minister Prasanna Ranatunga said that they will face the existing challenges and resolve the issues confronted by the public. The Opposition behaved in a similar manner even during the height of the war.
We have our shortcomings and we will rectify them accordingly.
Wimal Weerawansa and Udaya Gammanpila were also cabinet ministers and they cannot escape from getting the blame. Everybody has to take responsibility for the situation.
